channel.title: About on John Forstmeier
channel.description: Recent content in About on John Forstmeier

item.title: About
item.description: John is a Software Engineer and Data Scientist at HeavyWater working with big data and machine learning. Additionally, he is an open source maker and contributor responsible for co-creating the Heupr platform as well as a variety of other smaller projects. He is a periodic blogger and is in the process of compiling a trilogy of short works of science fiction he has been gradually writing over the years. In his spare time John enjoys lifting, yoga, and reading.
